targets.query: SELECT last("kern_uptm_days" ) * 1440 + last("kern_uptm_hrs" ) * 60 + last("kern_uptm_mins" )  FROM "show version" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$producer$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT mean("cpu_state_user")  FROM "show system resources" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$producer$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m)
SELECT last("memory_usage_used") / last("memory_usage_total") * 100   FROM "show system resources" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$producer$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s)
SELECT "disp_vlan" FROM "show mac address-table dynamic" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$producer$/)  GROUP BY "TABLE_mac_address"
SELECT mean("cp_vni_up") FROM "show nve vni summary" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$producer$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT last("numEstPeers") FROM "sys/bgp/inst" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$producer$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s) fill(null)

SELECT sum(peer) FROM (SELECT last("numPeers") as peer FROM "sys/bgp/inst" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$producer$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m), "source" fill(null)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m)

SELECT sum(peerP) FROM (SELECT last("numPeersPending") as peerP FROM "sys/bgp/inst" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$producer$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m), "source" fill(null)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m)
SELECT last("numPeers") - last("numEstPeers") FROM "sys/bgp/inst" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$producer$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s) fill(null)
